post:
Evolution Host – Unique offer for LEB! Free Enterprise grade VPS – For those who qualify

ddos, ddr4, evolution host, hdd, linux, ssd, VPS, windows January 20, 2020 @ 7:30 am, by Frank Williams

Evolution Host has reached out to provide a unique opportunity. They are offering a free enterprise grade VPS to those in the LowEndBox community that have a relatively popular website. While there is no specific criteria to match, a good start would be the site having a ranking of at least 20 on this scanner: https://moz.com/free-seo-tools
They would encourage those that do not reach a rank of 20 on this scan to apply anyway as this will not be the only factor considered in the application.
The relevancy of the applicant’s site will also be taken into consideration. No pornographic content or war mongering content of any kind will be accepted.

Their VPS hosting plans are available in a total of 9 locations, including the newly introduced: Warsaw, Virginia and Oregon.

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They accept PayPal, credit/debit cards and a wide range of cryptocurrencies as payment methods.

What makes Evolution Host stand out from the crowd? In their own words: 

“Evolution Host has been in existence since 2012 and trading in hosting solutions since 2013 (Formerly evolutionhost.co.uk). We like to stay relevant by introducing new technology, locations and or services to our brand every 6 months or so.
We offer 100% dedicated KVM resources, with stable CPU time availability and high clock speeds. Read: no throttling or tokenisation. Our VPS are particularly suited to game server hosting, with high CPU core clocks of up to 5.0Ghz – resulting in high single core performance. The high clock speeds are also beneficial for more traditional workloads.

Providing rock solid protection from DDoS attacks has been a long standing goal for Evolution Host. We pride ourselves in outpacing the competition in this area and can confidently say that we offer the best DDoS protection currently available in the industry. Our product range combines “OVH Anti-DDoS GAME” DDoS protection with additional heuristic and machine learning filtration systems which have been developed in house to provide broader layer 7 protection. We regularly protect clients who have previously “tried everything” with great success.”

Here’s the offer: 

Free Enterprise Grade VPS

  • 4 CPU Cores at 4Ghz+
  • 4GB DDR4 RAM
  • 80GB SSD or 350GB HDD
  • 1Gb/s Port
  • 60TB Monthly Transfer
  • Advanced DDoS Protection
  • Linux or Windows
  • Europe/US Locations
  • [ORDER HERE]
More info as always after the break.
